= !ExitCode property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

{{{
property ExitCode: LongWord;
}}}

== Description ==

_!ExitCode_ is a read only property that stores theexit code returned by the console application on completion. The value of the property is application dependent.

The value of _!ExitCode_ is meaningless if the _[TPJConsoleAppErrorCode ErrorCode]_ property is non-zero.
